verses.text: Ha t'a skal eb' yinhtilal Benjamín, ay jun winh vinac scuchan Cis, yuninal winhaj Abiel, yixchiquin winhaj Zeror. Ha winhaj Zeror chi' yuninal winhaj Becorat, yixchiquin winhaj Afía. Nivan yelk'och winhaj Cis chi' t'a eb' anima.

Ay jun yuninal winh scuchan Saúl, te wach' snivanil. Ha t'a skal masanil eb' israel, malaj junok wach' yilji t'a yichanh winhaj Saúl chi', te chaanh steel winh. Ha masanil eb' vinac t'a Israel, anhej t'a sjolom sjenhjab' winh sq'uek'och eb'.

Ay jun k'u ix satb'at juntzanh nok' sb'uru winhaj Cis chi'. Yuj chi' ix yal winh t'a winh yuninal chi': --Ak' lista a b'a, sb'at a sayan nok' b'uru chi', ik'b'at junok eb' winh co checab' ed'oc, xchi winh.

Ix b'at winhaj Saúl chi', ix k'axpajb'at winh t'a skal lum tzalquixtac t'a yol yic Efraín, ix ek' winh t'a yol yic Salisa. Maj chaxlaj nok' b'uru chi' yuj winh. Ix ek'pax winh t'a yol smacb'en Saalim yet' t'a yol yic Benjamín, palta malaj nok'.
Axo ix k'och winh t'a yol smacb'en Zuf, ix yalan winh t'a winh schecab' chi': --Conh meltzaj t'a tik, haxo ta tz'aji, swach' och winh in mam t'a ilk'olal cuuj t'a yichanh nok' b'uru chi', xchi winh.

Ix tak'vi winh checab' chi': --Ha t'a yol jun chonhab' tik ay jun winh schecab' Dios, te niwan yelk'och winh t'a eb' anima, masanil tas syal winh, tz'elnhejk'ochi. B'at quila', ol yal winh tas b'eal ol quik'a', xchi winh.
--Conh an, anhej to malaj jab'oc tas squik'b'at t'a winh, malaj junok ixim pan ay t'a yol co pa. Malaj jab'oc tas ol cak' t'a winh, ¿tas val ol quik'b'ati? xchi winhaj Saúl chi'.
Ix tak'vi winh checab' chi': --Ay jab' tumin plata ved'nac, ol cak' q'uen t'a winh schecab' Jehová chi', yic ol yal winh tas ol onh ajoc, xchi winh.

(Ha t'a peca' chi', tato ay junok israel sgana sk'anb'ej yab' srazón d'ha Dios syalan icha tik: B'at quil jun winh syal yilan chi', xchi eb'. Ha winh tz'alji schecab'oc Dios chi' ticnaic, ha t'a peca', a winh syal yilan junok tas ol ujok, sb'i winh yuj eb'.)
--Wach' jun, b'at quila', xchi winhaj Saúl chi'. Ix b'at eb' winh schavanhil b'aj ayek' winh schecab' Dios chi'.

Ayic van sq'ue eb' winh t'a svitzal chonhab' chi', ix schalan sb'a eb' winh yet' juntzanh eb' ix cob'estac van sb'at ik'oj ha', ix sk'anb'an eb' winh t'a eb' ix icha tik: --¿Ay am ek' winh schecab' Dios syal yilan tas ol ujok? xchi eb' winh.

Ix tak'vi eb' ix: --Ayek' winh t'a eyichanhb'at chi', palta tato tze pil val jab'ocxo eyip olto ilchaj winh eyuuj. Toto val sjavi winh t'a yol chonhab' tik yujto ay q'uinh ol och t'a tzalan b'aj tz'och ejmelal.

Anhej tzex k'ochi tze sayanek' winh t'a cal chonhab' chi', yacb'an manto b'at winh b'aj tz'och ejmelal chi' b'aj tanhvab'il yuj eb' anima. Masanto ol k'och winh, ichato chi' ol yalan wach' lolonel winh t'a yib'anh silab', haxo sva winh yet' eb' anima avtab'il chi'. Yuj chi' ixiquec val ticnaic, k'ocb'ilto ol eyil winh, xchi eb' ix.
Ix b'at eb' winh b'ian, haxo yic van sk'och eb' winh t'a yol chonhab' chi', k'ocb'il val ix schalaj sb'a eb' winh yet' winhaj Samuel chi', van sb'at winh t'a jun tzalan b'aj ol och ejmelal chi'.
K'ik'anocto sk'och winhaj Saúl, ix yalan Jehová t'a winhaj Samuel chi':

Ha k'ik'an yab' icha tik, svak'cot jun winh vinac t'ayach, ha t'a yol yic Benjamín scot winh. Tzak'q'ue aceite t'a sjolom winh, a winh ol och yajalil t'a chonhab' Israel tik. Ha winh ol colan in chonhab' tik t'a yol sk'ab' eb' filisteo, yujto toxo ix kus in k'ol yuj b'aj ix tevi eb' t'ayin, xchi t'a winh.
Ayic ix yilan winhaj Saúl winhaj Samuel chi', ix yalan Jehová t'a winh: Aton winh tik val t'ayach evi, a winh ol och yajaliloc in chonhab', xchi t'a winh.
Ha t'a spuertail chonhab' chi', ata' ix schalaj sb'a eb' winh, ix yalan winhaj Saúl t'a winhaj Samuel chi': --Al t'ayin mamin, b'ajtil ay spat winh schecab' Dios syal yilan tas ol ujok, xchi winh.
--Ha in toni. Conh ved'oc, b'ab'lajanh. Ol ach wa ved' b'aj van in b'at chi'. Ato k'ik'an swal t'ayach tas a gana tza k'anb'ej chi', slajvi chi' tzach paxi.

Ha yuj nok' b'uru ix satb'at t'ayach yictax oxji, manh ak' pensar yuj nok', toxo ix chax nok'. Palta ay jun mach te nib'ab'il yuj eb' quetchonhab' israel tik, a ach toni yet' eb' a k'ab' oc, xchi winh.

Ix tak'vi winhaj Saúl chi': --Ha in tik, yinhtilal in Benjamín, yelxo val jayvannhej co b'isul t'a quinhtilal chi' t'a skal masanil eb' quetisraelal. Anheja' eb' sk'ab' yoc in mam chi', malaj quelk'och t'a skal eb' quinhtilal chi'. ¿Tas val yuj tzal juntzanh tik t'ayin? xchi winh.

Ixlajwi chi', ix ik'jib'at winh yet' winh schecab' yuj winhaj Samuel chi' t'a yol jun cuarto, ix ak'ji jun k'ojnub' te niwan yelk'och t'a eb' winh t'a skal eb' winh avtab'il vael chi', ay am junok 30 eb' winh.
Ix yalan winhaj Samuel chi' t'a jun winh ilum vael t'a cocina icha tik: --Ik'cot nok' chib'ej ix val t'ayach to ch'oc tzik'caneli, xchi winh.

Elanhchamel ix yik'cot jun nok' xub' winh, ix yak'an winh t'a winhaj Saúl chi'. Ix yalan winhaj Samuel chi' t'a winhaj Saúl chi': --Ha jun chib'ej tik ik'b'ilxocaneli, chi'a. Ha jun tik to naanxotax vuuj, ix in chec ik'jicaneli, ayic ix in checan b'ojoc jun q'uinh tik, xchi winh. Junnhej ix wa winhaj Saúl yet' winhaj Samuel chi' t'a jun k'u chi'.
Ayic ix emixta eb' winh ta', ix emul eb' winh t'a yol chonhab' chi', ix lolon winhaj Samuel yet' winhaj Saúl chi' t'a spanhanil yib'anh pat.

Axo ix sakb'i t'a junxo k'u, ix avtaj winhaj Saúl yuj winhaj Samuel chi', ix yalan winh t'a winh icha tik: --Q'ueanh vaan tzach b'ati, xchi winh. Ix q'ue vaan winh b'ian. Ixlajwi chi', ix el eb' winh t'a yol calle.

Axo ix emk'och eb' winh t'a titac chonhab', ix yalan winhaj Samuel chi' t'a winhaj Saúl chi': --Al t'a winh a checab' tik to sb'ab'lajb'at winh, tzach kan jab'ocxo, yujto ol val tas ix schec Jehová val t'ayach, xchi winh. Ix schecan b'ab'laj winh schecab' winhaj Saúl chi'.
